website_summaries.verdict: A cream concealer that's a firm favorite. Works especially well on dark spots and discoloration.
pros: Super easy to apply and blend
Contains lemon peel extract aimed at diminishing dark blemishes over time
Non-sticky formula and natural, so can be worn alone as a blemish touch up if going without foundation
cons: Does not work as well to cover redness and rosacea
Some found it difficult to find a good color match

customer_reviews.title: USED product showed up!
customer_reviews.text: I've read about the kind of reviews where used/empty product shows up and can say now that I've experienced it myself. This case... it's pretty gross...used makeup. The order was LATE and then showed up in this condition. Blame the seller for thinking this is ok. I am a working mom so have gravitated to doing a lot of shopping via Amazon for the convenience factor. This is the first and last time for makeup product.
customer_reviews.author: adrienne grzeskiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Great with middle age oily skin.
customer_reviews.text: If you're a Bare Minerals fan, terrific add on. It blends easily with everything and coverage is subtle. No problems with breakouts or anything yet. (Late 40s w/oily still adolescent facial skin). The only makeup I use on my face (except for aging treatments). No toners just serums after washing. Don't use concealer often but I'm happy and it goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: JustBeachy

customer_reviews.title: Not so great. Colourpop is better/cheaper
customer_reviews.text: For me this is too oily and doesn’t set right. It settles into my crease and finds any subtle wrinkle to collect in making me look older (I’m 31 and don’t have crows feet). The color and coverage is good but it doesn’t last or set. I’d recommend colourpop concealer actually. It’s only $6.50 and sets really well.. again, just speaking for my skin (dry/oily combination - olive complexion).
customer_reviews.author: Alisan H.

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I've loved every BareMinerals product I've purchased and this is no exception. Covers my rosacea nicely, looks natural and you use very very little to obtain coverage. It also doesn't cause my rosacea to flare up as some other products have done
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concealer..light yet it covers blemishes and irregularities on your face. Works well with bare minerals powder over it. I'm 58 yrs old and always looking for good coverage. Glad they came out with a cream, the powder did not do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Too small,  too smelly
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed as the brand is good but I have the feeling these sat in a warehouse for years!!!! The smell of it is horrible, it has the old smell as if it isn't a fresh product and it made me breakout all over bt face. The price for the small size isn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So I did a lot of research before I bought this concealer for under my eyes. I was looking for a creamy concealer for a very long time and after lots of research I chose this one because it received great reviews online and it was economic. The problem is that it doesn’t really cover my dark circles and it wears off fairly quickly. I sometimes wear this over a color corrector Under my eyes but still I don’t get the same affect as I would from a good concealer. It’s too bad because I like the creaminess of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Goes on smooth, hasn’t creased. I am a 52 year old with the expected skin issues and intermittent dark circles. I apply this around my eyes. I do not wear shadow, but some liner and mascara. I am pleased. Much nicer than the elf eye primer- it is thicker. It is a bit pricier, but not a deal breaker. This is comparable to an Avon product I love, but has been unavailable so many times I gave up. Love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Sugarfoot

customer_reviews.title: Get A Shade Darker
customer_reviews.text: I have somewhat tan skin and needed a shade darker--always easier up spread out and make lighter than to do the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin Hero

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer
customer_reviews.text: Great concealer. I use it around the eyes. It does tend to wear off a bit during day, but easy to carry and reapply since it is such a small container
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Wong orders
customer_reviews.text: Wrong color ,I ask for bare Minerals correcting concealer broad spectrum 20 in tan ,I was sent medium 2 )price around $14. 00 which is ok but it not my color and to add to this complaint ,I also revived another package of the same products same small size right color tan 1 )but price way to high $41.54 order ID:114-87457529393834 . Will you please straighten out this mixup? I don’t have a printer to print return labels. I wish to credit these money back to my account and I will continue shopping for the right product at the price That I’ll be happy with. Please text me tell me what can be done, Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: betty stigler

customer_reviews.title: Love Bare Minerals
customer_reviews.text: I have crepey under eyes and concealers normally clump up. But with this if I just pat it lightly with my finger it goes on well and lightens up the dark circles. Dont rub it in, pat it on with your finger tip then after you apply foundation to the rest of your face, patt setting powder lightly over concealer. Dont use foundation under the eyes just the concealer :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carr

customer_reviews.title: My new go to!
customer_reviews.text: Used for clearing up under eye tired eye look. Great coverage that lasts along with spf 20! Not too sheer but also not too thick &buildable. The package is small but fair in price considering better ingredients than most. May look almost greasy in container but really not greasy. Has just enough moisture for helping any fine wrinkles but not dry. Also came safely & perfectly packaged. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Calor_de_Cali

customer_reviews.title: Kinda disappointed because this is a no return policy
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t a big fan of this product. A little greasy and didn’t last all day. I accidentally touched the quick order button and was surprised to see this in my doorstep. Kinda disappointed because this is a no return policy. I definitely deleted all of those stupid buttons so this can’t happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Leddy

customer_reviews.title: Not the coverage I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I would buy this product again. I have semi dark circles under my eyes and it did not give me the coverage I need. I will stick with my Tarte concealer, even if it is pricier
customer_reviews.author: abi

customer_reviews.title: Love bareminerals!
customer_reviews.text: Bareminerals makes a great product for concealing my under eye circles and fine lines. It helps soften my fine lines to make them less noticeable. Really love their products!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T

customer_reviews.title: My favorite concealer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, and a little bit goes a long way!! All you people on here complaining about the size of it... it's meant to be a spot/under eye concealer not something for your entire face! I had mine for 2 months before I needed to reorder, so stop giving bad reviews because you're not using it properly. Ugh, seriously people... This concealer is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Daniloo

customer_reviews.title: True Savings!
customer_reviews.text: So far so great.....this is the true artifact! Thanks for the savings Amazon. I tried two others prior and.......BARE MINERALS, they were NOT!!! Not even close!!
customer_reviews.author: "Beezer"

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, at least for my undereyes!
customer_reviews.text: I have really dark circles under my eyes due to poor sleep. This provides great coverage under my eyes, blends really well, and holds up decently throughout the day! (I bake using pressed powder after applying to set it.) It feels really light & not cakey at all. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good concealer. It’s not high coverage but does good enough to where under loose mineral foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Light and breathable on your face.
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! It really works to correct and redness or blemish marks.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: A concealer that corrects
customer_reviews.text: A cream concealer that is best used sparingly. I use a small brush to apply under eyes, red spots, and the howdy doody lines. Blend it in and apply foundation and powder. Covers and wears well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Steckline

customer_reviews.title: Too light-weight. Doesn't do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Too light weight, so it doesn't conceal in any way. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Betsyi

customer_reviews.title: Works great for covering up red lines
customer_reviews.text: It's very light I. Need to go one darker this time
customer_reviews.author: Gazell42

customer_reviews.title: Good brand works good
customer_reviews.text: Works nice. Small little container but goes far. I like the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Redwood

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.text: You cannot open the little compact without breaking a nail. Then once you get it open, it does nothing. They will not accept returns if you don't like it either. You must get a pair of pliers to open it. I think they should pay for repairing my nails.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Schneider

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all kinds of concealers and have never been as satisfied as I am with this product. I cannot use powered products because of my very dry skn ,,, so I was surprised to find Bare Minerals with a cream based concealer. Really glad that I tried it. I use Light 1 and it completely covers dark circles, red and brown spots and looks completely natural.
customer_reviews.author: TM Ohio

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I like to put a thin line under my outer arch of my brows. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer small amount
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer there just isn’t much of it.
customer_reviews.author: nikki baker

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Good coverage, goes on creamy and smooth
customer_reviews.author: Kay D Homan

customer_reviews.title: Does not do the job
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a powder like one I had bought before. It turned out to be a cake type that is rubbed on. I like this company's product so I thought I would try it. For a cover up, it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The concealer is fairly light, but that means that, under the eyes, it sits in the wrinkles under my eye and for covering a dark spot or blemish, it's just not that effective. Returning to Nars.
customer_reviews.author: Mo-shop

customer_reviews.title: Worst product
customer_reviews.text: This product I extremely low quality and tiny size. Not recommended at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ruma

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Lasts a long time. I apply with a flat brush. Great for pale skin. Blends great and helps if the area is a little dry...wont make it look worse like powder.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Concealer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent concealer. Very smooth and easy to apply. Blends very nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only products I use and great full that I can purchase at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found for a cream concealer
customer_reviews.text: Best I have found for a cream concealer. needs very little to work on the under eye area. The light works well as a highlighter.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this concealer. I have dry skin and this product goes on easily and lasts long. Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: G Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Weightless face powder
customer_reviews.text: I like the weightlessness of this powder. It evens out my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Expired makeup
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 star but the package that arrived today has an expiration date on it that is this month! This obviously has been laying around the warehouse and now I have to return it. I won’t wear old makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Hordych

customer_reviews.title: The best concealer you will ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: Its the best concealer and i would not use anything else. Love that it has a mirror inside too!!
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: Good item!
customer_reviews.text: Good item and mailed very quickly. I always love bare minerals!

customer_reviews.title: This covers well and stays on pretty well...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover up and has sunscreen too!
customer_reviews.author: mary lanser

customer_reviews.title: Coverage not as expected, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work well for dark shadows under the eyes, but I have a dark spot on my cheek that it doesn't cover very well. I did give it three stars because it does cover better than anything else I have found. But for the price I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Blends well and covers nicely. Feels light, yet you don't need much. This little thing lasts for months!
customer_reviews.author: Peni V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice All Around
customer_reviews.text: Nice texture and color match-easy to integrate on face and feels light.

customer_reviews.title: Bad return policy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't conceal and doesn't last. Worst part is it's non returnable. Will not be ordering from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would be lost without this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer! I have 4 young children and I probably don't get as much sleep as one person should, yet I always look refreshed and it's thanks to this concealer. Without it I would look like a raged zombie while grabbing my Tiramisu Latte and attending to my mom duties.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this concealer for years. Love it and love that I can have it delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy on
customer_reviews.text: Easy on n off. Stays on for a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Moultrie

customer_reviews.title: It make your face look fresh all day.
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealed. I used it for the hold face.it helps my makeup stay all day fresh. Love love love it.I bought 2 time .I am going to buy another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years. It's creamy and offers good coverage yet lightweight. Lasts pretty much all day if set with powder.
customer_reviews.author: SChin

customer_reviews.title: Great traveler as well
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years. It is part of the daily routine. Great traveler as well. Never disappoints. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Maggie_in_Ojai

customer_reviews.title: Can't do without this
customer_reviews.text: This is another of those products that I cannot do without. I use it as an eyelid primer and also for a cover for small imperfections. It stays on forever. Love it! Use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Gini Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing under-eye concealer!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing concealer! My BE foundation color is "fairly light" and this concealer in light 1 fits perfectly. It actually melt & blended like a 2nd layer of skin. My dark circle is almost invisible. Totally agree with another reviewer that pick the right color is key. Use this product as the final step to conceal.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Concealer
customer_reviews.text: This concealer works great for me! I have awful under eye circles and this has worked wonders covering them up. It lasts a while, I buy one about once every 3 months. So, very worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jenico.Wil

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't what I was expecting at all. It was very very small

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for blending. Very light weight coverage, perhaps too sheer

customer_reviews.title: 100% coverage
customer_reviews.text: 100% coverage for me. Love it and very light weight too. Will totally buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller package than expected but LOVE the coverage of the makeup

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Just applying a little bit, makes the skin looks smooth and It gives a natural look.

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: Alright, was hoping for a little more coverage, and to last a little longer.

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty sure this is counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and color are subtly different than the bareMinerals concealer I was trying to replace from Sephora. I don't believe that this is the real bareMinerals brand.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer! Definitely works like magic. Leaves your face looking smooth and free of marks. I will always use this product for quick touchups and for concealing blemishes! Works GREAT!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this concealer for several years now, and it's my favorite. It is easy to apply with a brush or your fingers and feels good on my skin.

customer_reviews.title: works well, but has a long list of potentially toxic ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: this product works very well... I just wish they had better ingredients. there is a lot of crap in here that I don't want to put on my skin every day...

customer_reviews.title: no no no in my (beyonce voice)

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful flaw cover up.
customer_reviews.text: It was lighter than I thought but worked even better. It covers my red discolorations and age spots and the slightly lighter color makes the color very uniform once the foundation is applied over the concealer. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with the smooth application
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for several years. Really happy with the smooth application

customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd purchase of this product. I have EXTREMELY fair and sensitive skin. This is by far the best concealer I have ever used. Never cakey.

customer_reviews.title: It works great for me as usual

customer_reviews.title: but best cover. Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've tried roll-ons, liquids, etc. in concealers. This is the easiest, least noticeable, but best cover. Love it!

customer_reviews.text: The only reason I did not give this 5 stars is that it doesn't come with a brush, nor does the product description and customer reviews say you need a brush to apply it. Yes, you can use your index finger, but it makes too deep a mark in the concealer cake and does not go on smoothly. You need a brush to use this!

customer_reviews.title: If u want to buy plastic and no product, purchase. Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Rip off, no product just plastic, will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Danica

customer_reviews.title: BareMinerals Concealer
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of the Bare Minerals concealer. I apply the "Medium 2" with a brush after using SPF 30 Complexion Rescue tinted moisturizer "Natural". Both are good color matches for me (no yellow or orange). I apply the SPF 20 concealer over brown spots which lightens them, then add a second layer over the darker ones, still a bit visible, but an improvement. The concealer never hardens in the container as a different brand has done. And the container has never broken as many make-up products can. No problems with breakouts or clogged pores. Always cleanse before bedtime! I also enjoy using BareMinerals lipsticks and glosses, blushes (Beauty and Lovely), lip liners (Electrified and Revved), and powders.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Real nice product & came quickly
customer_reviews.text: Received it quickly & it was perfect. Goes on nicely too!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Emmons

customer_reviews.title: I just love the
customer_reviews.text: Matched my skin tone exactly. Goes on very smooth. I just love the product
customer_reviews.author: connie brock

customer_reviews.title: I have rosacea and this concealer is excellent at demenishing the red down to barely there
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea and this concealer is excellent at demenishing the red down to barely there. This is before makeup. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Shier

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving theee stars because you can spend the same amount of money at the bare minerals store and get a larger product. This is about the size of a quarter. Granted, you don't need much and the makeup itself is great for coverage and what you would expect from bare minerals, it's just smaller than I thought. I but a lighter color and use it under. My eyes to give a "glow" and appearance I'm not tired so I don't need much and this will last me. But be aware.

product_meta.title: bareMinerals Correcting Concealer SPF 20, Light 1, 0.07 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:LightCorrecting Concealer SPF 20 provides lightweight coverage, helping to decrease the appearance of dark spots and discolorations for a radiant, even-toned complexion. Using a powerful botanical brightener plus broad spectrum SPF 20, this creamy concealer for acne works to visibly brighten skin while providing medium-to-full coverage. Formulated without parabens, synthetic fragrances or artificial oils, it blends seamlessly to conceal blemishes, dark under eye circles and other skin imperfections all day long.
feature_bullets: This is a aluminizing pen that brings light and radiance to the skin
Immediately erases any signs of fatigue
Free from parabens, synthetic fragrances and artificial oils
